transcript: Last year you will also remember our shoes got wet. I got sand in my panties We got in a big fight over nothing you got a sore throat and we did not see the grunions

segments.text: Last year you will also remember our shoes got wet. I got sand in my panties
We got in a big fight over nothing you got a sore throat and we did not see the grunions

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Last year, you will also remember, our shoes got wet.  I got sand in my panties.  We got into a big fight over nothing.  You got a sore throat and we did not see the grunions.
